meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mary Dupuis John Gose Richard Perez-Pena Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #710.

td.p: Mary Dupuis, an architectural student originally from Cleveland, Ohio
John Gose, a caterer from Los Angeles, California
Richard Perez-Pena, a journalist originally from Cuba (whose 2-day cash winnings total $16,500)

tr.td: U.S. HISTORY
STARTS WITH "H"
KID STUFF
THE BIBLE
COMMON BONDS
FILMS !
(Alex: All of the film titles have an exclamation point at the end.)
